title: Why do people drive down the center (\suicide\") lanes on Market Street like it\'s a driving lane and not a turning lane? Do police ever ticket for this? It\'s so stressful so be driving and have a car fly out from the other side of the road then drive beside you in the center lane. Is this a common traffic design and are there any more traffic accidents on roads that have this center lane vs. roads that have a median?"
